title: Property Editor shows the properties of layout items when switching to Master page viewer
description: Property Editor still shows the properties of layout items when switching to the Master page viewer.
OB: This can confuse customers who might mistakenly believe it is the Master Page Editor and inadvertently set properties without first clicking on the Master page viewer.
SR: To reproduce: 1. Create a new report and insert a label. 2. Select the label. (Property Editor shows label's properties) 3. Switch to the Master page viewer.
